GameItemType.Description: This staff can unleash blasts of lightning.

GameModifier.Provides: Enables abilities that require a Ranged Staff

GameModifier.Provides: Backswing- If the attack misses the unit gets a second attack against the same target

GameItemType.Description: This axe smoulders with an internal fire, but when its handle is gripped the blade bursts into flame.

GameItemType.Description: The battle axe is built for war and those with the strength to wield it are worthy of caution.

GameItemType.Description: "With axes like these, why do I need diplomacy?" - The Warlord Verga before beheading his diplomatic advisor.

GameItemType.Description: The spirit of an ice elemental is bound into the sword and it incessantly whispers for its wielder to lie down and sleep forever.
